name: Wings: Director's Cut
blurb: A full HD remake of Cinemaware's classic WWI Amiga game featuring never-before-seen content!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Your name in the credits under the Special Thanks Kickstarter Backers list!\r\n\r\nThis is our smallest pledge - every pledge counts and we appreciate your support!

All previous rewards included PLUS:

- Digital version of "The Art of Wings" (a booklet featuring beautiful concept art created exclusively for the Director's Cut)!

- Digital version of the Wings Graphic Novel (an illustrated short tale featuring a surprising side-story in the Wings universe)!

- PDF copy of the original Wings instruction manual (as featured in the Amiga version)!

- PDF copy of the Aviator's Briefing Manual (as featured in the Amiga version)!

This pledge level is perfect for those who only want digital goods as well as those outside of the USA who do not want to deal with taxes/VAT/shipping costs of physical goods!
